post:
Hello, I will be launching a service shortly offering CPanel Shared Hosting and Managed CPanel Dedicated Servers in New York, NY, Kansas City, MO, and Seattle, WA.  To get things rolling a bit and to get the excitement up regarding the launch, we are giving away free CPanel Hosting accounts on our New York server.

**Our Node Includes The Following:**
Intel XEON Processor - 8 Cores
64GB Ram
Raid-10 1TB Hard Disk Drives
1Gbps Network Port - Shared - Instant activation!

The Free Plan:
5GB Disk Space
100GB Monthly Bandwidth
Unlimited Hosted Domains
Unlimited MySQL Databases
Unmanaged - You Break it, you lose it!
Support via Tickets, Phone Support, Email, and AIM.
**[Order Here ](https://secure.hostingite.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=8)**
